metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34503 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
QPDF v8.4.2 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow via the function QPDF::processXRefStream. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted PDF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34503` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqpdf26 - 9.1.1-1ubuntu0.1
qpdf - 9.1.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qpdf package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.1.1-1ubuntu0.1').
